summary: Adds a number of boss fights in Skyrim
descriptionHtml:
New Versions
Test version
-added a texture for Gigas, but it's glitching. If you want to help me with it then you
can download it and look for the problem

Have you ever wanted to have real boss fights in Skyrim?
If yes,then this mod is the answer! This mod will add 4 bosses and 2 mini-bosses to Skyrim

The list of bosses are:

Sanguis,The Sabrecat
Can be found in Hamvir's Rest

Gigas,The Giant
Can be found near the Guardian Stones (Gigas is 2 times bigger than a normal giant)

King and Queen Mudcrab
Can be found near Swindler's Den

Each boss will drop 5000 gold and are respawnable

The mini-bosses are

Allegro and Discord
Can be found with the King and Queen Mudcrab

Bugs
1.For some reason, Allegro is too fast and runs away when there is a fight
2.Part of Sanguis' feet are on the ground
3.The head of "The Hunted" doesn't match the body color. Use console commands and
change her weight to fix it
4.Part of Sanguis' fur is transparent

If you have any suggestions or more bug reports, then just tell me in the comments

Coming Soon:

Devil Goat (20,000 gold)

Insane Cannibal

Devil Goat Worshippers

Firaga (Skeleton)

Glaciem (Sabrecat)
author: DiscordLol
